rect.style: fill: rgb(38, 38, 42); paint-order: fill; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round; stroke: rgb(38, 38, 42); stroke-width: 1;

path.style: fill: rgb(38, 38, 42); stroke: rgb(38, 38, 42); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; transform-origin: -183.81px -82.742px; stroke-width: 1;
